author: Guilherme Epifanio
description: I had the pleasure of working with Tim Mansell in the Digital team for more than one year at the University of Melbourne. As a co-worker, It was great to have him in the team, he knows how to deal with stakeholders, and have amazing Frontend skills, such as JavaScript, HTML, and CSS, I had the opportunity to learn from his code reviews, which made me a better developer. I strongly recommend Tim; he is responsible, and technically a sound employee.

author: Matt Oâ€™Dea
description: Tim worked with the Graphic Cafe for over 4 years, in that time Tim lead the web development side to the business, his ability to problem solve was second to none as we often tested the boundaries of web and interactive development.

author: Randy An
description: Tim is a really brilliant developer and he has wide knowledge in the IT industry.

author: Ross Brownson
description: Tim provided a one stop website which was fresh and interesting showcasing my business's attributes.

author: Rusty Brooke
description: I dealt with Tim on the implementation of my company's website while he was at The Graphic Cafe. Tim's sage advice and IT skills proved to be invaluable, especially to a cyber-illiterate like me.
